-- | Media CMS extension for Yesod apps
--   
--   LambdaCms is a Content Management System (CMS) in Haskell using Yesod.
--   This package contains the "media" extension.
@package lambdacms-media
@version 0.0.2

module LambdaCms.Media.Message
data MediaMessage

module LambdaCms.Media
instance LambdaCmsMedia master => YesodSubDispatch MediaAdmin (HandlerT master IO)
